resp:

   5. Repeat step 3 for all drivers from the American Spirit Team Johansson.
   6. Check if there are any drivers who do not satisfy the claim but were initially included in the list of drivers from the American Spirit Team Johansson. If so, mark them as not satisfying the claim.
